price: 21. Dis : « Je ne saurais ni vous nuire ni vous conduire vers le chemin de la droiture. »
arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّي لَآ أَمۡلِكُ لَكُمۡ ضَرّٗا وَلَا رَشَدٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qul innī lā amliku lakum ḍarran walā rashadan
